content: Hi everyone! We've been working on a new website for CDS Hooks for the last few weeks. It's now live so check it out and let us know what you think! http://cds-hooks.org/

The content from the old site has been moved over as-is to the new site (we switch publishing platforms). We're now going to go through the site and update the content / rearrange things to make it flow/look nicer
Another site to add to my never ending reading/monitoring list ;)
